protocol.name: P-GSE18987-2
protocol.text: Under continuous light at 22°C. Nonsterilized plants were grown in pots containing a 1:1 mixture of vermiculite:Jiffy mix (Sakatanotane).

protocol.name: P-GSE18987-4
protocol.text: Labelled using protocol described in Affymetrix manual "3' IVT Express Kit User Manual"

protocol.name: P-GSE18987-5
protocol.text: Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA

protocol.name: P-GSE18987-6
protocol.text: Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.

protocol.name: P-GSE18987-7
protocol.text: Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system

protocol.name: P-GSE18987-8
protocol.text: Plants were grown under continuous light at 22°C. Nonsterilized plants were grown in pots containing a 1:1 mixture of vermiculite:Jiffy mix (Sakatanotane).
